src:
Unggah Anggaran Lem Aibon, William PSI Dilaporkan ke BK DPRD DKI
04 Nov 2019, 22:43 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Warga DKI Jakarta bernama Sugiyanto melaporkan anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta William Aditya Sarana kepada Badan Kehormatan (BK) DPRD DKI Jakarta. William dianggap melanggar kode etik karena mengunggah rencana anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82,8 miliar.
"Bapak William Aditya Sarana diduga melanggar kode etik karena mengunggah rencana KUA-PPAS ke media sosial. Sedangkan rencana KUA-PPAS itu belum dibahas di forum DPRD atau masih dalam pembahasan dalam rapat-rapat komisi atau rapat Banggar DKI Jakarta," ucap Sugiyanto saat dalam keterangannya, Senin (4/11/2019).
Sugiyanto melaporkan William kepada badan kehormatan hari ini. Dia mengaku ditemui oleh Ketua badan kehormatan Achmad Nawawi.
Sugiyanto pun keberatan William mengadakan konferensi pers soal temuan anggaran tersebut. Akhirnya, pembahasan anggaran lem Aibon ramai dibahas oleh masyarakat.
"Akibat dari publikasi tersebut oleh Bapak William di media sosial dan dilakukan konferensi pers, maka menimbulkan persepsi negatif dan kehebohan di publik sampai saat ini," kata Sugiyanto.
text:
Upload Lem Aibon Budget, William PSI Reported to BK DPRD DKI
Nov 04 2019, 22:43 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Jakarta resident named Sugiyanto reported DKI Jakarta DPRD member William Aditya Sarana to the DKI Jakarta DPRD Honorary Body (BK). William is considered to have violated the code of ethics for uploading a budget plan for Aibon glue of Rp.
"Mr. William Aditya Sarana is suspected of violating the code of ethics for uploading the KUA-PPAS plan to social media. While the KUA-PPAS plan has not been discussed in the DPRD forum or is still being discussed in commission meetings or the Jakarta Banggar meeting," said Sugiyanto while in his statement, Monday (11/04/2019).
Sugiyanto reported William to the honorary body today. He claimed to have been met by the head of the honorary body Achmad Nawawi.
Sugiyanto also objected to William holding a press conference about the findings of the budget. Finally, the Aibon glue budget discussion was widely discussed by the public.
"As a result of the publication by Mr. William on social media and conducted a press conference, it caused a negative perception and excitement in the public to date," said Sugiyanto.
